headline: Asian Life Insurance Company Limited has distributed 3,28,473.91 units of unsold ordinary right shares through an auction to interested individuals, company, association/institutions on Ashwin 20, 2082 and the refund process for non-allottee's begins today, Ashwin 22, 2082 and the final cut-off price is as Rs.422.5
